doc.field: Green Associate certificate, 2011 (expires 2013, so the box also holds related material for later years certification). Print matter/audiovisual: several books, CDs, DVDs, some floppies re: green construction, climate change, biodiesels/fossil fuels, and related. 3 copies of a CD-ROM: Instructor Resources to go with "Sustainable Green Design & Firefighting: A Fire Chief's Perspective" by Spadafora." Some folders with documents re Spadafora's recertification as Green Associate and docs re revising his "green book" through another publisher. Some loose email printouts re prepping for his John Jay course. Textbooks, memos, etc re: Incident Management system (IMS)/Incident Management Team (IMT)/Emergency Management Assistance Compact (EMAC); these are generally FEMA publications but IMT docs are specific to NYC. "Emergency Response to Terrorism" Student Manual and self-study guide, from the National Fire Academy, with miscelleous related documents inserted by Spadafora; guides circa 1997, inserts into early 2000s. "Fire Command" textbook. (Includes digital formats)
